item.title: How to Pick a Password
item.description: Most of what you’ve been told about generating a good password is wrong. The well intentioned advice of pick a phrase and then obfuscate (ie, Fish Tacos are Delicious becomes F1$hT4c05rD3l1c10u5) it is still valid, but a bit misguided and not enough.

item.title: Things I Believe
item.description: Over the years, I’ve encountered a lot of a technology platforms, programming methodologies, and ways of doing business.     During that time, I’ve come up with thoughts and ideas that guide me through my working life.  This is of course the ideal.  I’ve fallen short many times and will continue to do so I’m sure (See below…).
